title: Roll of Paper
description:
A roll of paper, as toilet paper (toilet tissue). May also be a roll of kitchen/paper towels. Depicted at various angles, with a sheet unfurling.

Commonly used for toilet paper but may also be used for various content concerning toilets, going to the bathroom, bathrooms, cleaning, or paper more generally.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's roll of paper emoji presents a tightly bound scroll with a slightly textured surface, illuminated by soft, realistic lighting that casts subtle shadows.  The edges of the paper are softly rounded, giving it a tactile, vintage appeal characteristic of Apple's 3D rendering.  This emoji commonly symbolizes documents, historical records, important announcements, or creative projects, suggesting something significant being unfurled or presented.
